csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <macro name="blob">
        <text value="I AM A BLOB"/>
    </macro>
    <citation>
        <layout prefix="[" suffix="]" delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="editor">
                <name/>
                <substitute>
                    <names variable="translator"/>
			        <text macro="blob"/>
                </substitute>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
